import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import AnimatedSection from '../common/AnimatedSection'; import AnimatedElement from '../common/AnimatedElement'; import './Intro.css'; const Intro = () => { // Staggered animation for children const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.2 } } }; const itemVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.6, ease: "easeOut" } } }; return (
WELCOME TO

Kaboul Gourmet

 Large arched windows, high stone ceilings and elegant interiors provide the perfect backdrop to Kaboul Gourmet's traditional yet modern Afghan menu in the heart of Chelsea, London. Inspired by centuries of Afghan culinary tradition, our menu celebrates the finest seasonal ingredients prepared with authentic techniques. Each dish is carefully crafted to showcase the unique flavors of Afghanistan, with a contemporary twist.

Seasonal Menu

Locally sourced, seasonal ingredients

Award Winning

Recognized for culinary excellence

Private Dining
